description: An interesting magazine that contains information about swords and sword fighting techniques from all across the world.
It seems to be a guide to edged weapon combat, poorly photocopied and released on spiral- bound paper.  Still, there are lots of useful tips for beginners.

name.str: Special Knife Techniques of the Special Forces
name.str_pl: copies of Special Knife Techniques of the Special Forces

description: Most armies around the world have an elite unit or two. The soldiers in them are trained to use several modern firearms and sophisticated, expensive, next generation weapons systems. This magazine details how these mighty men of mayhem and professional violence from around the world presumably use... short blades, of all things. Fascinating. No, it really is.
